title: 逻辑链接模块 Base
content: {$before}[[span class="logical-link-wrap"]][[[{$name}]]][[span class="logical-link-internal logical-link-internal-[[#if {$internal} | true | false ]]"]][[span class="logical-link-title logical-link-link-[[#if {$internal-link} | true | false ]]"]][[[{$name}|]]][[/span]][[span class="logical-link-custom logical-link-link-[[#if {$internal-link} | true | false ]]"]][[[{$name}|{$internal-link}]]][[/span]][[/span]][[span class="logical-link-original logical-link-original-[[#if {$original} | true | false ]]"]][[span class="logical-link-appended"]]（[{$branch}{$name} 原文链接]）[[/span]][[span class="logical-link-title logical-link-link-[[#if {$original-link} | true | false ]]"]][{$branch}{$name} {$name}][[/span]][[span class="logical-link-custom logical-link-link-[[#if {$original-link} | true | false ]]"]][{$branch}{$name} {$original-link}][[/span]][[/span]][[#if {$mark} |  | [!-- ]][[span class="logical-link-mark-common" style="color: {$color-common}"]]^^[[span class="fa fa-link"]]@< >@[[/span]]^^[[/span]][[span class="logical-link-mark-newpage" style="color: {$color-newpage}"]]^^[[span class="fa fa-link"]]@< >@[[/span]]^^[[/span]][!-- --][[/span]]{$after}
author: Sekai_s
